book.title: GT version Archive Service: System Administrator's Guide

abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with the WS MDS Archive Service. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.

important.simpara: The Archive Service is built and installed as part of a default GT version installation. For basic installation instructions, see . No extra installation steps are required for this component.

chapter.title: Deploying
chapter.para: The Archive Service is deployed into the Globus container by default during the standard toolkit installation.

section.title: Deploying into Tomcat
section.para: The WS MDS Archive Service has been tested to work without any additional setup when deployed into Tomcat. Please follow these to deploy GT4 services into Tomcat. Note: please complete any prerequisite service configuration steps before you deploy into Tomcat.
